scripts.allchromeexecutions: npx playwright test --project=chrome --reporter=line,allure-playwright && allure generate ./allure-results --clean && allure open ./allure-report
scripts.allsafariexecution: npx playwright test --project=safari --reporter=line,allure-playwright && allure generate ./allure-results --clean && allure open ./allure-report
scripts.allregression: npx playwright test --project=chrome --grep @regression --reporter=line,allure-playwright && allure generate ./allure-results --clean && allure open ./allure-report
scripts.allsmoke: npx playwright test --project=chrome --grep @smoke --reporter=line,allure-playwright && allure generate ./allure-results --clean && allure open ./allure-report
scripts.dryrun: npx playwright test --grep @dryrun --project=chrome --reporter=line,allure-playwright && allure generate ./allure-results --clean && allure open ./allure-report
